mapper.select: SELECT n.notification_id notification_id, n.notification_title notification_title, n.notification_content notification_content, n.notification_time notification_time, f.file_id file_id, f.file_name file_name, f.file_path file_path FROM t_notification n LEFT JOIN t_file f ON f.notification_id = n.notification_id WHERE notification_type = #{v} ORDER BY n.notification_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_notification(notification_id, notification_title, notification_content, notification_time, notification_type) VALUES (#{notificationId}, #{notificationTitle}, #{notificationContent}, #{notificationTime}, #{notificationType})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_notification SET notification_title = #{notificationTitle}, notification_content = #{notificationContent} WHERE notification_id = #{notificationId}
